name: TradeShow Teacher
overview:
COMPANY OVERVIEW

TradeShow Teacher is a result-driven, full-service trade show management firm specializing in all that is trade shows from show selection to display booth messaging and production to post show reports and lead follow up. Although primarily serving larger businesses with a multiple annual trade show program, and predominantly specializing in hi-tech, bio-tech and healthcare verticals, TradeShow Teacher is also available for hourly and per diem consultation in most any industry In the current economic climate, statistics reflect that trade shows have experienced sustainability because the cost effective nature and the immeasurable value of the exposure exhibiting businesses receive. Based in South Florida since 2005, TradeShow Teacherâ€™s objective is to make sure its clients are receiving the most impact for their trade show investment. This includes greater exposure, enhanced public relations, securing qualified leads and networking contacts, increased ROI and an overall trade show program growth. TradeShow Teacher is headed by its founder and President Linda Musgrove, who is the author of The Complete Idiotâ€™s Guide to Trade Shows, published in 2009 by Alpha Books/Penguin Publishing. She is surrounded by a team of qualified professionals with backgrounds in public relations, design, marketing, journalism, communications and information technology.
